subject: Grass
Athletics and Sports
Football
Trademarks and Trade Names
Bankruptcies
lead_paragraph: AstroTurf, the brand name synonymous with artificial grass, fell on hard times in 2004, when the company went bankrupt. Jon Pritchett is trying to bring it back to life.
snippet: AstroTurf, the brand name synonymous with artificial grass, fell on hard times in 2004, when the company went bankrupt. Jon Pritchett is trying to bring it back to life.
